author: Jim Y
comment: Like many other developed do, let us device if want ambient or not.  Don't give me a great looking face that dissappears after 5 seconds.  I do t care how fast the battery drains. I've got that covered.
title: Ambient mode is awful

author: billyboy boyboy
comment: I love the ambient mode for this watch face, but HATE the dimmed mode!  There needs to be an option to turn dimmed mode on/off.  Then 5 stars.
title: Hate the Dimmed Mode

author: Oje Ojeaga
comment: Lit up, this watchface has a surprisingly realistic look on my Sony Smartwatch 3. Interestingly enough, it doesn't look as good on my LG Watch Urbane - The colours are over saturated and cartoony. What IS sorely lacking is a day/date add on. It would take this from good to gravy.

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content:
Thanks for your feedback Oje!
Next release will come with a configurable option to show day/date on the bottom part of the face, stay tunned! :)

title: Solid Watchface

author: Arnold Vizer
comment: With the new update, some of the UI elements are pixelated on my LG G watch. Thanks for the fix,  great work!

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content:
Hi Viz,
The issue with textures has been fixed.

We apologize for the inconvenience.

title: UI is pixelated

author: Stuart Bache
comment: Nice looking watch face but I no longer use as the ambient mode looks dreadful.

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content:
Hi Stuart!
Thanks for your feedback. What do you mean in dreadful? how could we fix it to look better?
Best!

title: Ambient mode a let down

author: Ivo Roilev
comment: The watch face is very beautiful and looks like a real, expensive and well-designed watch But there are some negatives I found: 1. Too quickly goes to energy saving mode, I'd like to show off my 'real' watch 2. As others reviewers mentioned, no date display, I think it could fit the design scheme without spoiling it - most of the expensive watches have it anyway 3. In the energy-saving mode, the digits are too close to the center. I understand, that they are on the same position as in the 'normal' face, but still it leaves huge empty space between the numbers and the bezel, and since this mode is used most of the time, makes the otherwise expensive looking watch, look cheap and funny 4. The orange 'minutes/seconds' ring, around the white hours ring duplicates the physical ring around the display of the LG G Watch R - there could be an option to remove it, and make the hour numbers closer to the bezel  But the biggest problem is, that the normal watch face doesn't use the whole display, there are around 10 pixels in each direction, that the face doesn't use ?!?  LG G Watch R here

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback, Ivo!
We are planning on launching a new update wich will allow to activate or deactivate optional stuff in the watch as date / duration of display before going to dimm, etc.
We have a newsletter in http://www.omitsis-barcelona.com to update customers with our news: feel free to join us!
Will fix the pixel bug you reported!

title: Nice looking but with some flaws

author: john monkan
comment: Amazing looks elegant on my zenwatch :) can we get settings options change color of hands and a day/ date option would be top also you keep up the amazing work finally I found faces worth the money!!
title: Wow

author: Kishore Babani
comment: Watchface is excellent!  Somehow it seems like it has not been updated. All the Google Now cards take up 50% of the screen space instead of the standard 20-25% which leaves little watchface visibility.

author: Frank Zeuner
comment: Once the option to turn on and off optional things on the watch face are added, will be 5 stars
title: Looks great

author: Andrew Staley
comment: I love how this face is Moto 360 friendly. It adjusts the face to account for the "flat tire" ambient sensors.
title: Finally a watch face that's Moto 360 friendly!

author: Marius Mihalec
comment: Please add an option to keep the same face in ambient mode
title: Ambient mode

author: Ken Hilaire
comment: Please add options for day, date and, if possible, battery levels. Thanks.
title: Lovely designed face

author: Mike J.
comment: One of the best faces on the market. Great attention to the fine detail. Love the simple elegance. Great job.

author: andrew zarins
comment: A proper premium watch face. Some of the faces I have used look pixelated. This looks clean and is well designed. 100% this is the best watch face out there!
title: Best watch face out there

author: Riko Gonzalez
comment: One of the best watchface makers right now!
title: Gorgeous Will Buy More!

author: Matt Watson-Power
comment: But I'd so much like to see it with a little date number window - I use this a lot with a watch.
title: Such a beautiful, understated, elegant and subtle design.

author: Matthew Fiori
comment: Needs some way on connected phone  to force update to watch.
title: Looks great

author: Don C
comment: One of the best looking faces for the 360 but the screen lags from Orange numbers to the normal colors.  Please fix because I cannot use this face until you do.
title: Please fix the lag.

author: Nick Carter
comment: It isn't really round. It is cut off on the right edge and slightly off center.  Very nice looking however.

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. Could you please contact us at android@omitsis.com? We'd like to do some testing with your Moto 360 in order to fix that issue you mentioned. Thanks again!

title: Moto 360 issue

author: George Collins
comment: Latest update seems to have corrected the battery drain issue on my Gear Live.

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback, we are currently working towards a solution to fix this battery problem.

title: Update: (fixed) Battery killer

author: Kevin Jones
comment: As others have said,   watch face is off center and does not look good with Moto360.

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content: We finally fixed it for Moto 360! enjoy ;)

title: Doesn't work with Moto360

author: Seth Schorr
comment: Looks great but uses a lot of power. I'll only be able to use it for special occasions.

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content:
Hi Seth,

thanks for your feedback. Could you please contact us at android@omitsis.com so we can help you with any issues you might have? Regarding the battery, we haven't seen any battery problem since our last update. What smart watch are you using?

Thanks!

title: Very attractive but eats through battery

author: J Makimbo
comment: Now the batterydrain is fixed this is one of my favourite faces... please make more!

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback. We've updated the watch face with a fix for the battery problem. Could you please check that it is fixed now? If not, please contact us again.

title: Fantastic Face

author: Mike Cormier
comment: Nice looking but causes lag on gear live.

author: Jeff Mitchell
comment: Love the design but after choosing this face my battery went from 89% to 20% in an hour. I am guessing it is the always moving second hand as I have had similar results with other faces that had that as well. If there were an option to simply turn off the second hand I think it would solve everything.

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback, we are currently working towards a solution to fix this battery problem.

title: Great design, but it killed my battery

author: Oriol Mercadé
comment: I installed lots of smartwatch faces and all of them where too simple: You could tell a developer designed it.  Its so nice to use a watch that is really well designed!  totally worth!
title: thank you for doing such a realistic and fine smooth looking watch!

author: Ryan Habbeshaw
comment: There is a picture showing it should work, but it doesn't.  There isn't any customizing, and only a square template available

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content:
Hi Ryan, thankyou for your feedback. 
Can you contact us in android@omitsis.com so we can fix it for you? Once it's fixed and working we will send it to you for free.
Best,

title: Doesn't work on moto360

author: David Broome
comment: Had to refund as this does not work on the Moto 360 as other reviewers have written. I sent the developer an email as requested in those other reviews as well, but thought I'd document my review for posterity as well.  Great design, just not configured for Moto 360.

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content: We finally fixed it for Moto 360! enjoy ;)

title: No Moto 360 Support

author: Aaron Merrill
comment: Horrible lag on Gear Live.

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content:
Hi Aaron,

thanks for your feedback. Could you please send us an email to android@omitsis.com so we can help you solve the lag problem?

Thanks!

title: Great looking... But...

author: Leon Stewart
comment: Please fix, I would love this one

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content: We finally fixed it for Moto 360! enjoy ;)

title: Love the look but doesn't work on 360

author: Aaron Johnson
comment: Refund. Patch and I'll buy again.

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content: We finally fixed it for Moto 360! enjoy ;)

title: Face off center, moto 360.

author: Kenneth Andreasen
comment: Great looking,  but drains battery fast.  No options to change the colors.

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback, we are currently working towards a solution to fix this battery problem. (It's currently solved, we fixed the battery drainning problem)

title: Drains battery
